query-expression.comment: RINQ (Ruko INtegrated Query) expression mini-language TODO: unify the query clauses to reduce redundancy, since they are mostly similar in structure.

set-clause.comment:
Set operations in queries using logical operators
- and: conjunction or intersection, & or &&
- or: disjunction or union, | or ||
- xor: exclusive or or symmetric difference, ^ or ^^
- nand: "not and" or alternative denial, ~& or !&
- nor: "not or" or joint denial, ~| or !|
- xnor: "not xor" or equivalence or biconditional, ~^ or !^
- imply: material conditional or implication (if-then), :> or ->
- cimply: converse/reverse implication, <: or <-
- nimply: non-implication or denial of the antecedent, :< or !<
- cnimply: converse non-implication or denial of the consequent, >: or >!
set-clause.begin:
(?x)\s*
(?<!(?:(?<!\.)\.|[?!:]:|[?!-]>)=?)\b
(
(?: n?and # and, nand
| x?n?or # or, xor, nor, xnor
| c?n?imp # imply, cimply, nimply, cnimply
) \b\s*\b
(?: all|any|some|every )? # optional quantifier
)
\b\s*

patterns.name: support.type.property-name.css.ruko

patterns.comment:
Scalar primitive types
bool: 0 or 1
rune: unicode codepoint
char: UTF-8 character
str: UTF-8 string
sym: interned string (symbol)
blob: byte array
buf: byte buffer
unit: empty value
num: numeric value (int, real, etc)
nat: natural number (0, 1, 2, ...)
uint: alias for nat
int: signed integer
rat: rational number (p/q)
real: floating point number
imag: imaginary number (bi)
comp: complex number (a + bi)
quat: quaternion (a + bi + cj + dk)
oct: octonion (a + bi + cj + dk + eℓ + fm + gn + ho)
decimal: arbitrary-precision decimal
bigint/bignum: arbitrary-size integer
patterns.match:
(?x)\s*(?<![?!]?\.|[?!:]:|[?!-]>)\b(
[bB]ool|[rR]une|[cC]har|[sS]tr|[sS]ym|[bB]lob|[bB]uf|[uU]nit
|[nN]um|[nN]at|[uU]?[iI]nt|[rR]at|[rR]eal|[iI]mag|[cC]omp|[qQ]uat|[oO]ct
|[dD]ecimal|[bB]ig(?:int|num)
|(?i:[iunfcjqo]\d+) # match num types with bit sizes like i32, u64, f16, c128, j32, q256, o512
)\b
patterns.name: support.type.builtin.primitive.ruko

patterns.comment:
Numeric and math types
Vec2/Vec3/Vec4: small fixed-size vectors
MatNxM/Mat4: matrices
Tensor: multidimensional numerical array
Point/Rect/Size: geometry helpers
Color: color/rgba container
Quaternion/Complex/DualQuat: rotations and complex numbers
Fixed: fixed-point numeric type
patterns.name: support.type.math.ruko

patterns.comment:
Collection and container types
Array/Tuple/List/Set/Map: standard collections
Slice/Span: views and dynamic arrays
Stack/Queue/Deque/Ring: linear containers
Box/Option/Result: ownership and optional/error containers
HashMap/HashSet/BTreeMap/BTreeSet: sorted/hash collections
Graph/Tree/Dag: graph-like structures
patterns.name: support.type.collection.ruko

patterns.comment:
Algebraic & error handling types
Option/Some/None, Result/Ok/Err, Either/Left/Right, Maybe, Void
patterns.name: support.class.error.ruko

patterns.comment:
Pattern, parsing and regex types
Regex/Pattern/Parser/Tokenizer/Matcher
patterns.name: support.class.pattern.ruko

patterns.comment: Include built-in classes from other languages to improve recognition

support-classes.comment: Ruko probably won't have a large set of built-in classes, so we include common built-in types from major languages to improve recognition of cross-language codebases

patterns.comment:
DOM & Web API types
Common browser and web platform interfaces (HTML, DOM, Fetch, WebAudio, WebGPU, WebXR, etc.)
patterns.name: support.class.dom.ruko

support-functions.comment: Names for general support functions in Ruko standard library organized by naming conventions for maintainability

support-functions-core.comment: Core built-in functions from major languages, to improve recognition of cross-language codebases
